announcement.message: As Sovryn has only recently launched, there is currently a <0>$21 limit</0> on all transactions on the platform. We will be raising this limit to $210 soon. Thank you for being an early adopter!

hintHowToConnect.hintOne: Before you can trade and lend with Sovryn, you need to connect to the RSK network.
hintHowToConnect.hintTwo: Get instructions on how to connect with <0>Metamask</0> or <1>Nifty</1> and then connect your wallet:

serviceWorkerToaster.title: App was updated.
serviceWorkerToaster.message: New content is available and will be used when all tabs for this page are closed.

optin.title: Success
optin.text: You will now receive email notifications when your positions are close to liquidation, and if a position has been liquidated. You may opt out of these at any time

unsubscribe.title: You are now unsubscribed from email notifications
unsubscribe.text: You will no longer receive emails about margin calls or liquidated positions. You can re-subscribe to these notifications at any time.

tradingHistoryPage.title: Trading History
tradingHistoryPage.auth: Please connect and authorize your wallet.
tradingHistoryPage.noClosedTrades: You do not have any closed trades.

meta.title: Fast-BTC
meta.description: Move your Bitcoin to RSK network.

fastBtcForm.title: Fast-BTC Relay

history.title: History
history.walletHistory: Enter your RSK wallet address to see history.

fastBtcForm.connect: Connect to your wallet or just enter wallet address above yourself.
fastBtcForm.exchanging: We are exchanging to rBTC it now.
fastBtcForm.transfered: was transfered to your RSK walllet

hintHowToTopUp.hintOne: You're connected! To trade and lend with Sovryn, you will need some Bitcoin on the RSK platform.

notificationFromContainer.want: Want to receive email notifications about margin calls and liquidated positions?
notificationFromContainer.update: Update the name or email address associated with this wallet address.
notificationFromContainer.recieve: I would like to receive emails about updates and new features from Sovryn

whiteListedNotification.text: Currently Sovryn is available for invited users only and your wallet is not yet whitelisted. All interactions is disabled until you switch to whitelisted wallet or get whitelisted for current one.

activeUserBorrows.text: You do not have any active loans.

approve.title: Approve Tokens
approve.description: Confirm transaction in your wallet to approve {{amount}} {{asset}} spending in this smart-contract.

pending_for_user.title: Pending for user
pending_for_user.text: Please confirm transaction in your wallet.
